This AI Crypto Meme Coin Races ...

Join Our Telegram channel to stay up to date on breaking news coverage The PaLM AI price surged 24% in the past 24 hours to trade at $0.6641 as of 05:22 a.m. EST on trading volume that surged 116% to $2.7 million. This comes as AI-related tokens continue to surge, following last week’s stellar fourth-quarter results from AI chip maker Nvidia. The announcement boosted sentiment around the whole AI industry and it’s trickled down to AI-related crypto tokens. #NVIDIA has a pretty good track record of beating earnings expectations. We’ve seen a surge in #Ai development which should boost demand for graphics cards and GPU’s. So my guess is they beat expectations once again. pic.twitter.com/QjvGPhuGK6 — Nick $WADZ🇺🇸🐉 (@Crypto_Viking11) February 21, 2024  Some of the biggest gainers include SingularityNET (AGIX) (up 27%), Fetch.ai (FET) (up 15%), and Render (RNDR) (up 13%). Could the newfound interest in AI tokens drive the PALM price even higher? Throughout February, the price of PaLM has been on a gradual upward trend. However, starting from February 20th, there has been a tug-of-war between the bulls and the bears, resulting in price fluctuations within a $0.5 range. Despite this, the bulls have demonstrated resilience, pushing the price up within a rising channel pattern, but they faced resistance at the $0.78 mark. This led to a minor retracement to the support level at $0.62, yet the bulls have managed to maintain positive momentum. PALM is currently trading above both the 50-day and 200-day Simple Moving Averages (SMAs), which is a confirmation of the bullish momentum. Additionally, the 50-day SMA is trading above the 200-day SMA, which further supports the bullish prospects of the PALM price. The Relative Strength Index (RSI) is trading around the 50-midline level at 53. With sustained bullish momentum, the RSI could soar to the overbought regions.  The Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) coincides with the current slight retrace as the moving average line (blue) crosses below the signal line (orange). However, the MACD is trading above the neutral zone, signaling a rebound to the upside. The red bars on the histogram indicate an impending rebound, as they stretch slightly under the zero line. Additionally, the Average Directional Index (ADX) is trading at 41, indicating that the current bullish trend is very strong. The PaLM price is on a bullish rally as it trades within the rising channel, and the bulls aim to retest the resistance at $0.78. This will breach the upper boundary of the rising channel, allowing the price to soar even higher. However, the MACD represents a bearish crossover, which may open doors for investors to sell. This could lead to a price retrace to the $0.5728 support level, coinciding with the 50-day SMA. Meanwhile, as the PALM price soars, investors who are looking for cryptos with supercharged potential are also exploring Scotty the AI, an AI-integrated project that analysts say has the potential to 10X on launch. Scotty the AI (SCOTTY) is poised to be a project providing different layers of AI innovation while transforming perceptions of security and fraud detection within the blockchain industry. The project has already established several features that are AI-powered to help the community while also providing utility to the meme coin. This new Ai coin is set to explode when it launches.
